ZikrInEnglish: Glory be to Allah and praise be to Him
All praise is due to Allah
There is no god but Allah
I seek forgiveness from Allah
Allah is the Greatest
There is no power and no strength except with Allah
ZikrInArabic: لَا حَوْلَ وَ لَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ

ZikrInEnglish: Sufficient for us is Allah, and He is the Best Disposer of affairs
Glory be to Allah and praise be to Him, Glory be to Allah the Great
ZikrInArabic: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ الْعَظِيمِ

ZikrInEnglish: My Lord, increase me in knowledge
We have no strength except through Allah
ZikrInArabic: لَا حَوْلَ وَ لَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ

ZikrInEnglish: O Allah, I ask You for Your forgiveness and Your mercy
I put my trust in Allah, the Lord of the Mighty Throne
ZikrInArabic: تَوَكَّلتُ عَلَى اللَّهِ رَبِّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ

ZikrInEnglish: Subhan Allah, Alhamdulillah, Allahu Akbar
ZikrInArabic: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ، الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ، اللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ

ZikrInEnglish: O Allah, guide me and help me
O Allah, forgive me, and have mercy on me
O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evil of what I have done
ZikrInArabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا عَمِلْتُ

ZikrInEnglish: There is no god but Allah, Muhammad is the Messenger of Allah
ZikrInArabic: لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ مُحَمَّدٌ رَسُولُ اللَّهُ

ZikrInEnglish: O Allah, protect me from the evil of the whisperings of the Shayatin
O Allah, make the Quran the spring of my heart
I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from the evil of what He has created
ZikrInArabic: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ

ZikrInEnglish: O Allah, grant me peace and blessings upon Your Prophet Muhammad
O Allah, I ask You for Your mercy, love, and forgiveness
O Allah, make the Quran a light for me
O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the Fire
ZikrInArabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابِ النَّارِ

ZikrInEnglish: O Allah, forgive my parents and have mercy on them
O Allah, bless me and protect me
SubhanAllah wa bihamdihi, SubhanAllahil-Azim
ZikrInArabic: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ، سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ الْعَظِيمِ

ZikrInEnglish: O Allah, grant me success in this life and the Hereafter
ZikrInArabic: اللَّهُمَّ رَبِّ قِنِي فِي الدُّنْيَا وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ

ZikrInEnglish: Verily, in the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest
Allah is the Protector of the believers
Praise be to Allah, Lord of the worlds
